email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can lower the freight rate to $51.00 per ton, but that’s the best I can do given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.00 per ton. However, we’d like to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. Can you confirm if this is acceptable? Also, please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. The laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Looking forward to receiving it. Best, John
